subject: Re: FW: New starter immunisation requirements and declaration working on form.pptx
preview: Thanks Heath for another awesome online 'thingy' for us to use. It will make a huge difference to our recruitment task.  We will work on the employment commencement form in the coming weeks and send t

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath for another awesome online 'thingy' for us to use. It will make a huge difference to our recruitment task.

We will work on the employment commencement form in the coming weeks and send thru the job specs for that.

Tx again!

Hi Sharon, 

Confirming we have updated the policy link and added the 'No' option to the influenza question :)
@heath ohw sorry, All good now. Please check again.

@manuel can you please watch this and make the changes please:
https://www.loom.com/share/6f689705f4d54b64a03dc0c34e023302

Thanks,
LOgged 5 mins to Harvest
@heath done update https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/ @rica 5mins task.
@manuel please update the policy link. You can download a copy of it to the website server and then link that one up. Thanks

HI Heath

Thank you for making those changes. We have now finalised the policy which is at the following link

https://hssaustralia.sharepoint.com/:b:/g/EXAAdKKYl3xFs0Ir3klu5qMBWYKP5bYSXfXtCPisiI6wTA?e=3lK9Qu

Regards

Sarah

And I just realised one other small change

Under the Tick section for Flu/Influenza can we include a 'No' option for the agreement to undertake. This is not a mandatory requirement and therefore we wont force anyone to undertake the flu shot

Hi Sarah, 

Sure, confirming we have added the extra fields for you:
https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/immunisation-declaration/

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: @heath Please check the added field at the first page. https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/immunisation-declaration/

We just need to tweak a few things which Sharon should be able to do next Tuesday

Thank you. It's looking great
@manuel can you please add the below fields? Thanks

HI Heath

The form is great. You managed to navigate our instructions without any questions!! Impressive.

We will work on finalising the policy and the link so we can add that in. I realised that we need to add a few starter questions on the first page so that our quality manager (or someone other than the hiring manager) has context when reviewing the documents. Could we add the following fields on the first page:

Name of Position Applied For

Name of Hiring Manager or NUM

Email address

Contact Number

Once those changes are made and after we have sent you the final link, it's very close to being ready.

Thanks you

Hi Sarah, 

We do need the link to the policy please. We have just added temporary one there for now.

Thanks Heath

Sharon and I will go through this tomorrow. At first glance it looks great, with my only initial question being the very first hyperlink doesn't take me to the policy on Sharepoint. Is this just a placeholder for now or do you need me to provide you the link

Sarah

Hi Sarah, 

Hope you are well. 

We have now created the form for you. You can view it here: https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/immunisation-declaration/

Currently when someone submits their responses a notification email will be sent to you. We can send this to any email address(es).

Let me know what you think?
@heath please check it again. https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/immunisation-declaration/

@manuel thank you. 

All of the yes or no questions should be a radio button please, not a check box. Thanks
Logged 2.5hrs to Harvest

Hi @heath Please check it now. https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/immunisation-declaration/

@rica time spend 2.5hrs

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli
